TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>就會引發事件，每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>上可見<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。 若要改善效能，請在 設定屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs>變更而不是直接存取的資料格中的資料格的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。 如果您以手動方式繪製儲存格，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。 如果您未設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>至`true`，資料格會透過您的自訂繪製。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md)。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs (System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView dataGridView, System.Drawing.Graphics graphics, System.Drawing.Rectangle clipBounds, System.Drawing.Rectangle cellBounds, int rowIndex, int columnIndex, System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates cellState, object value, object formattedValue, string errorText, System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle cellStyle, System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle advancedBorderStyle, System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts paintParts);

public: DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridView ^ dataGridView, System::Drawing::Graphics ^ graphics, System::Drawing::Rectangle clipBounds, System::Drawing::Rectangle cellBounds, int rowIndex, int columnIndex, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewElementStates cellState, System::Object ^ value, System::Object ^ formattedValue, System::String ^ errorText, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ cellStyle, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle ^ advancedBorderStyle, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewPaintParts paintParts);

new System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs : System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView * System.Drawing.Graphics * System.Drawing.Rectangle * System.Drawing.Rectangle * int * int * System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates * obj * obj * string * System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle * System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle * System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts -> System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs
MemberSignature.Usage: new System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs (dataGridView, graphics, clipBounds, cellBounds, rowIndex, columnIndex, cellState, value, formattedValue, errorText, cellStyle, advancedBorderStyle, paintParts)

Docs.param: The that contains the cell to be painted.
A that represents the area of the that needs to be repainted.
A that contains the bounds of the that is being painted.
The row index of the cell that is being painted.
The column index of the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of the values that specifies the state of the cell.
The data of the that is being painted.
The formatted data of the that is being painted.
An error message that is associated with the cell.
A that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
A that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of values specifying the parts to paint.

Docs.exception: is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdvancedBorderStyle As DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle

Docs.summary: Gets the border style of the current .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 變更目前的框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>所設定的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.AdvancedBorderStyle%2A>屬性設為其中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。
若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#302](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#302)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#302](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#302)]

Docs.summary: Gets the cell style of the current .
Docs.value: A ，其中包含目前的儲存格樣式。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 變更目前的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>所設定的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>屬性。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClipBounds As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle ClipBounds { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the area of the that needs to be repainted.
Docs.value: A所代表的區域，需要重新繪製。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A>屬性代表的區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，需要重新繪製。 比方說，如果使用者涵蓋整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>與另一個視窗，然後發現，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A>代表整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。 如果使用者涵蓋的範圍縮小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，然後發現，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A>表示所涵蓋的小型區域。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。
若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#302](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#302)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#302](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#302)]

public: property int ColumnIndex { int get(); };

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>正在繪製的資料列標題儲存格時，屬性會傳回-1。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ErrorText As String
public: property System::String ^ ErrorText { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a string that represents an error message for the current .
Docs.value: 字串，代表目前的錯誤訊息。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>是資料列的標頭儲存格，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ErrorText%2A>屬性等同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>。 當目前儲存格的資料格時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ErrorText%2A>相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。
若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

remarks.format:
